name: Rooted (Webox)
description:
A Puzzle game where you have to guide the last standing tree's roots to gather water and minerals.

Connect to each water source and collect all the minerals to move to the next level

Go deeper and deeper, Watch out for the moles and find your way through the rocks. 

Controls:

- WASD to move the root

- SPACE to enter picker mode

- SPACE again to select another root segment and branch

- R to restart

- P to skip the level

How to play

- Move the root to connect to all water nodes

- Collect all the minerals in the level

- Watch out for yout strength, if you ran out the root dies

- Find the exit
